attributes.action: During Covid-19 Gov should follow the Danish example in regards salaries in SMEs
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Parliament to debate this action and for the Chancellor to action it if approved.
attributes.background: The Danish Gov has offered to cover 75% of salaries up to approx £2500 in private enterprises that don't make anyone redundant during the Covid-10 outbreak. I propose the UK Gov offers the same assistance to SMEs that are financially viable in the UK to help avoid redundancies and benefit payments.

Find out more and watch the Committee put questions suggested by petitioners to Government Ministers and the Deputy Chief Medical Officer: https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/news/145767/committee-question-deputy-chief-medical-officer-and-ministers-on-coronavirus-response/
